wblut.external.straightskeleton

Class OffsetSkeleton<E extends Machine>

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.external.straightskeleton.OffsetSkeleton<E>

  • public class OffsetSkeleton<E extends Machine>
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 input - given in constructor old - the copy we make and store in var corners output - the copies we return in the Offset
    Author:
    twak
